LanguageData.SoED_ThoughtGoldSkinGreedy.stages.label: Midas touch
LanguageData.SoED_ThoughtGoldSkinGreedy.stages.descri: I AM GOD IN THE FLESH! Tremble and prostrate before my majesty!
LanguageData.SoED_ThoughtGoldSkinAscetic.stages.label: rejection
LanguageData.SoED_ThoughtGoldSkinAscetic.stages.descr: I can't believe I put THIS on myself! Why this show? I'm sick of it!
LanguageData.SoED_ThoughtGoldSkinNormal.stages.label: golden skin
LanguageData.SoED_ThoughtGoldSkinNormal.stages.descri: A strange but pleasant feeling. It doesn't look bad.
